channel.title: Apps on Datasketch developers
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on Datasketch developers

item.title: How to develop Datasketch Apps
item.description: Generic Apps Objective Develop many apps at once that share the same funcionalities. Features All apps should have the following funcionalities Same layout {shinypanles} Data Panels Data upload Data preview or tweaking Visualization Panels Inputs, controls and options for users Result previews Data upload from multiples sources: Googlesheets, local files, url {dsmodules} Datasketch Open Data {dsconnect} Export data and results Download in multiple formats {dsmodules} Publish to Datasketch Library {dsconnect} Multi-language support {shi18ny} Custom inputs (search, color palettes, etc) {shinyinvoer} Use tidy data types for humans when possible {homodatum} {datafringe} Use data validations for table inputs {hotr} with dictionaries {datafringe} Use parametrized apps from config files {parmesan} Package structure Generic app components Layout {shinypanels} Interact with Datasketch library {dsconnect} Interactive table input {hotr} Data packages Data types for humans {homodatum} Tidy Data for Humans {datafringe} Visualization packages Ggplot wrapper {ggmagic} Highcharts wrapper {ggmagic} Leaflet wrapper {ggmagic} Geo data {geodata} Develop specific apps App pipeline See galley of live apps here https://airtable.
